snippet.title: Growtopia Teaser
snippet.description:
-- http://www.growtopiagame.com --

Growtopia is an experimental multiplayer creative sandbox platformer with crafting where you can:

* Build a house, dungeon, or anything else with your friends
* A universe of unlimited worlds, all persistent and connected to eachother with doors you can build
* Full chat and messaging, innovative lock system to protect your creations and give access to friends
* Completely free, using a single currency which can be earned in-game
* Plant seeds to grow trees, mix seed types to create new kinds of items
* Hundreds of amazing items to discover
* Supports Xperia Play controls
* Optimized for small AND large screens
* Original sountrack by Cory Mollenhour

Growtopia is a collaboration between old school indie game designers Seth A. Robinson and Mike Hommel.

Available now on Android and iOS!  Go get it, it's free!
iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/app/growtopia/id590495115?mt=8
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rtsoft.growtopia
